biotools.summary: Computational method that integrates gene expression analysis with genome wide association studies to determine whether an a priori defined sets of genes shows statistically significant, concordant differences with respect to gene expression profiles and genotypes between two biological states. Gene sets are generally a group of genes that are putatively functionally related, co-regulated, or tightly linked on the same chromosome.

bioschemas.name: GSAA
